title: Q&A: What next for investors after Neil Woodford resigns from Patient Capital Trust and Income Focus
text:
In another twist to the Neil Woodford saga, Britain’s best-known fund manager has resigned and been forced to suspend dealing in his smaller Income Focus fund.

The smallest of the portfolios he runs has suffered the same fate as the Equity Income fund after the manager announced he would be winding down Woodford Investment Management.

He has also resigned his position as manager of the Patient Capital investment trust and Telegraph Money understands a new manager is expected to be announced next week.

Income Focus

Why has it been suspended?

This week, Woodford Investment Management said it will resign from its role as investment manager of the fund.

As a result of this Link, the fund administrator,...
description: In another twist to the Neil Woodford saga, Britain’s best-known fund manager has resigned and been forced to suspend dealing in his smaller Income Focus fund.
